articles.title: Rasmus Hojlund set to undergo medical ahead of completing proposed Manchester United move - The Athletic
articles.description:
Rasmus Hojlund will travel to Manchester on Tuesday and undergo a medical before completing his proposed transfer to Manchester United.
United have an agreement with Atalanta to sign the 20-year-old striker in a deal worth €75million plus €10million in add-on…
